commit_message:
Rewrite all_diagnostic_infos to be constexpr

I want all_diagnostic_infos to be constexpr to improve startup time and
reduce binary size. .error(...) can't be made constexpr because it
requires an instance of the error struct.

Rewrite QLJS_X_ERROR_TYPES to invoke an ERROR() macro instead of calling
an .error() member function. Also rewrite users of
diagnostic_info_builder to be constexpr-friendly (with ugly macro soup).

This commit shouldn't change behavior.

files_changed.patch:
@@ -7,6 +7,9 @@
 #define QLJS_CPP_CONCAT(x, y) QLJS_CPP_CONCAT_(x, y)
 #define QLJS_CPP_CONCAT_(x, y) x##y
 
+#define QLJS_COUNT_ARGS(...) QLJS_COUNT_ARGS_(__VA_ARGS__, 5, 4, 3, 2, 1, 0)
+#define QLJS_COUNT_ARGS_(_0, _1, _2, _3, _4, count, ...) count
+
 #endif
 
 // quick-lint-js finds bugs in JavaScript programs.
